items.sentence: It doesn't really matter to me who does that, as long as it gets done.
Tom is learning French, but he still isn't able to speak it very well.
Tom was one of the men that the police arrested yesterday in the park.
Mary knew that Tom was a married man, but she flirted with him anyway.
Mr. Jackson is a very strict teacher and many students don't like him.
Mary assumed that the bunch of flowers left on her desk were from Tom.
I want to know what happened to the pistol that you received from Tom.
I want to do some bass fishing, but I don't know what to use for bait.
I would never have believed that such a thing could ever happen to me.
Tatoeba: Where pillow fights can't even measure up to sentence fights.
